Teensy 3.2 or LC: 20x4 LCD with I2C backpack: (note you only need one):
Power jack for use with pedal board power supply  (optional)
Strip (vero or tag) board used to solder wiring
Female header pins for the strip board and Teensy/mini usb shield.
Some type of footswitch enclosure. I used one of these:
USB micro to USB Female B panel mount cable: (optional)
9v to 5v step down power converter (optional for using with 9v)
MIDI “breakout board” or make your own MIDI IN/OUT circuit.
A bezel for the LCD. Make your own
Stand offs, bolts , and nuts to mount LCD and other stuff to enclosure.
